application-name.label: Application Name
application-name.hint: Identifies a group of forms (for example "acme" or "sales")
application-name.help:
The application name is a name which allows grouping form together. The application name (or app name) can be, for example:

  • a company name such as "orbeon" or "acme"
  • a company entity such as "hr" or "sales" or "engineering"
  • a project name such as "mercury" or "phoenix"

This name shows in the URL of the deployed form, so we recommend you use only lowercase characters.

form-name.label: Form Name
form-name.help:
The Form name is a name which is local to an application name, for example "address" or "claim".

This name shows in the URL, so we recommend you use only lowercase characters.

dialog-publish.create-new-version-help: PLEASE NOTE: Publishing this form definition will create a new version of the form definition in the database. Data which already exists in the database will still be viewed and edited with the previous versions of this form definition which are associated with that data. The new form definition version will be used to create new data.
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-help: PLEASE NOTE: This will overwrite the existing form definition. If the changes you have made to the form definition are small, such as changing control labels, the form definition will be compatible with existing form data. But if you have made structural changes, such as adding, removing, renaming, or moving controls, the form definition might be incompatible with existing data. We recommend being careful when overwriting an existing form definition version.

dialog-publish.create-new-version-help: PLEASE NOTE: Publishing this form definition will create a new version of the form definition in the database. Data which already exists in the database will still be viewed and edited with the previous versions of this form definition which are associated with that data. The new form definition version will be used to create new data.
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-help: PLEASE NOTE: This will overwrite the existing form definition. If the changes you have made to the form definition are small, such as changing control labels, the form definition will be compatible with existing form data. But if you have made structural changes, such as adding, removing, renaming, or moving controls, the form definition might be incompatible with existing data. We recommend being careful when overwriting an existing form definition version.

dialog-publish.create-new-version-help: NOTA: La pubblicazione di questa definizione di modulo creerÃ una nuova versione della definizione del modulo nel database. I dati che esistono giÃ nel database potranno ancora essere visualizzati e modificati con le versioni precedenti di questa definizione del modulo che sono associati con tali dati. La nuova versione della definizione del modulo verrÃ utilizzata per creare nuovi dati.
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-help: NOTA: Questo sovrascriverÃ la definizione di modulo esistente. Se le modifiche apportate alla definizione di modulo sono piccole, come cambiare le etichette di controllo, la definizione del modulo sarÃ compatibile con i dati del modulo esistente. Ma se sono state apportate modifiche strutturali, come l'aggiunta, la rimozione, la ridenominazione, o il movimento dei controlli, la definizione di modulo potrebbe essere incompatibile con i dati esistenti. Si consiglia di essere attentiti quando sovrascrive una versione della definizione di modulo esistente.

dialog-publish.create-new-version-help: MERK OP: Publiceren van deze formdefinitie maakt een nieuwe versie van de formdefinitie in de database. Bestaande gegevens in de database kunnen nog wel met de vorige versies van deze formdefinitie waaraan deze zijn gkeoppeld, worden bekeken en bewerkt. De nieuwe versie van de formdefinitie wordt gebruikt om nieuwe gegevens te maken.
dialog-publish.overwrite-version-help: MERK OP: Hiermee overschrijft u de bestaande formdefnitie. Als de wijzigingen die u in de formdefinitie hebt gedaan klein zijn, zoals wijzigingen in control-labels, dan zal de formdefinitie compatibel zijn met bestaande formgegevens. Als u echter structuurwijzigingen hebt gedaan, zoals het toevoegen, verwijderen, hernoemen, of verplaatsen van controls, dan is de formdefinitie mogelijk incompatibel met bestaande gegevens. We raden u aan om voorzichtig te zijn bij het overschrijven van bestaande versies van formdefinities.
